query.statement: INSERT INTO FMM_MY_RECIPE ( UPJANG , RECIPE_SET , SUBINV_CLASS , RECIPE_CD , CUSER , CDATE , UUSER , UDATE ) SELECT #TO_UPJANG# AS UPJANG , #TO_RECIPE_SET# RECIPE_SET , SUBINV_CLASS , RECIPE_CD , CUSER , SYSDATE AS CDATE , UUSER , SYSDATE AS UDATE FROM FMM_MY_RECIPE A WHERE UPJANG = #UPJANG# AND RECIPE_SET = #RECIPE_SET# AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM FMM_MY_RECIPE B WHERE UPJANG = #TO_UPJANG# AND A.SUBINV_CLASS = B.SUBINV_CLASS AND A.RECIPE_CD = B.RECIPE_CD ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM FMM_UPJANG_RECIPE_MST C WHERE UPJANG = #TO_UPJANG# AND A.SUBINV_CLASS = C.SUBINV_CLASS AND A.RECIPE_CD = C.RECIPE_CD )
